title: Fraser C. Heston's Needful Things
itunes:title: Fraser C. Heston's Needful Things
itunes:subtitle: Before the Losers leave Castle Rock for good, they head over to the local theatre to catch Fraser C. Heston's 1993 adaptation of Needful Things. Afterwards, they discuss the film at Nan's over a slice of pie and a cup of warm coffee. From Ed ...
description:
Before the Losers leave Castle Rock for good, they head over to the local theatre to catch Fraser C. Heston's 1993 adaptation of Needful Things. Afterwards, they discuss the film at Nan's over a slice of pie and a cup of warm coffee. From Ed Harris' portrayal of Sheriff Alan Pangborn to Patrick Doyle's spirited score, nothing is left off the table. 


Follow us on Facebook | Twitter | Instagram | Patreon


Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.
